comments.body:
The code should return only after the Execution isn't in "ACTIVE" state anymore:
https://cloud.google.com/workflows/docs/reference/executions/rest/v1beta/projects.locations.workflows.executions#State
This operator only triggers an execution. Users should use sensor to wait for execution completion. Of course we can add synchronous waiting but this may influence idempotency
Ok, non-blocking WorkflowExecutionsCreateExecutionOperator + sensor sound good.
